title: UI Developer Training
description: Mindmajix’s UI Developer training will help you develop the skills and knowledge required for a career as a certified UI developer. It focuses on the fundamental concepts of HTML, JavaScript, CSS, JQuery, Bootstrap 3, and Angularjs for designing and developing web pages through real-time use cases. You will also get an opportunity to work on two real-time projects in our training which are in line with the UI Developer Certification exam.
what_will_learn: |Work on Adobe Creative Suite such as Photoshop, Flash & Flex to mockup UI elements|Use social network APIs (from Google+, Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, LinkedIn, etc) to integrate social actions|Stay familiar with popular content management systems like osCommerce, Joomla, WordPress, and Magneto|Conduct usability testing to check and fix the UI bugs, and gather information from target users|
prerequisites:
What are the prerequisites for the UI Developer course?The following are the prerequisites to become a master in UI development.

Graphic design
HTML
CSS
JavaScript
AJAX

jQuery
Java
Ruby on Rails
SQL database
instructor_bio: Having 9+ years of experience working closely with industry, Ramakrishna is one of the best-certified trainers of MindMajix. He has bagged Ui Developer, React JS, FullStack and can deliver the best technology to our trainees.
review|1|review: When I thought of going for UI Developer certification, my friend suggested to me about this training session. I was happy that these sessions helped me a lot to gain the confidence to get certified in UI development. I recommend this course for the people who want to excel their career in UI development.
review|2|review: I found the material for UI Developer Course was to the point and Mindmajix delivered the best-in-class Training that helped me gain a thorough insight into many concepts.
short_description: Enroll now for UI Developer Training and Get Expertise in Front End Technology.

title: Angular Training
description: Mindmajix Angular certification training is designed for developers who are responsible for building applications using AngularJS. Through a combination of presentations and hands-on practices, participants will explore Angular comprehensively and learn to build components, directives, template-driven forms, routing, etc., for complex data-centric (enterprise) applications. This Angular online training will update your knowledge and skills with the current Angular version to lift your career.
what_will_learn: |Knowledge of JavaScript and JQuery|Knowledge of MongoDB|Basic Knowledge of NoSQL|Basic understanding of NodeJS|Basic knowledge of HTML and CSS |Understanding of TypeScript |
prerequisites:
Who Should Learn Angular Course?




Mindmajix angular course is designed for those who want to learn client-side design and development techniques and start their career as a front-end web developer. This course is ideal for the following professionals.

Web developer
Web app developer
Associate technology analyst
UI developer
UX developer
MVC web developer
Front-end developer
JavaScript developer
target_students: |You’ll have an excellent understanding of CSS, HTML, and Typescript using Angular Programming as front end technologies.|Good understanding of the Angular 8 concept to create a front end application.|You can access the web services and fetch the CRUD operation.|You’ll learn how to create a Single Page Application and how AngularJS facilitates their development|Master AngularJS Filters, Expressions, and Scopes|Write AngularJS directives|Build Angular Forms|Unit test and end-to-end test their AngularJS applications|Accurately separate the models, view and controller layers of applications and implement them using AngularJS|
instructor_bio: With 6+ years of experience in training and nine years of working experience, Ketan is a certified professional, has trained more than 250 students and delivered seven corporate firms with live online sessions worldwide.
review|1|review: Mindmajix is a great platform to explore new courses. I recently completed the Angular8 training course and successfully cleared the Angular certification. Good support delivered by the entire team.
review|2|review: I took Angular online training from Mindmajix. The trainer is good at explaining concepts with real-time scenarios. I am very happy with the course content delivered by him. Thanks to my friend for introducing Mindmajix to me.
review|3|review: Everything about the Angular training was absolutely amazing. The Instructor is an experienced professional and excellent at delivering concepts as per real-time client specifications. I Highly recommend it for the people who are strongly looking for a career in Angular 10.
